section.heading: District of Columbia Public Schools school-level budget model.

para.text: As part of the District of Columbia Public Schools' ("DCPS") regular multi-year strategic planning and goal setting, DCPS shall include, and make publicly available, an analysis of the model used to determine school-level budgets for DCPS schools. The analysis shall include the following:
A summary of DCPS costs, including personnel costs;
Research in education and education finance;
A discussion of budget alignment with DCPS priorities; and
